Reviews.Title: VITEK has excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: wtfrubs
Reviews.Content: I really like VITEK products mainly because their customer service is OUTSTANDING. I have a VITEK DVR for my home and decided to buy another one for my business mainly for this reason. So far, I have no problems with my DVRs and I have owned my first one for 6 years now.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Peters
Reviews.Content: Product was easy to install and use. I would recommend it.  I purchased it about a month ago and so far, it has worked great.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 Video Inputs with 1 Main, 1 Spot Monitor Output and 1 DVI output.
Supports both Dynamic and Static IP Addresses
Up to 240 IPS Recording / Live Display
Remote Viewing over the Internet, LAN, Explorer, Safari, Firefox, Opera (Blackberry) and Chrome
Applications for iPhone, iPad, iTouch and Droid Devices
ProductInfo.Name: Vitek CCTV VT-EH4/500 4 Channel H.264 DVR with 500GB HDD and Real Time D1 Recording
